channel.title: Flood-Irrigation on PKYDRIP
channel.description: Recent content in Flood-Irrigation on PKYDRIP

item.title: 21 Hectares of Rice Flood Irrigation Solution
item.description: Previous irrigation plans were all customized water-saving plans for customers. Today we will introduce a customized rice flooding plan using water hoses.
